mapper.insert: insert into yogiyo_user (user_no, user_name, user_id, user_password, user_tel, user_email, user_birth) values (yogiyo_user_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select user_no as no, user_name as name, user_id as id, user_password as password, user_tel as tel, user_email as email, user_status as status, user_birth as birth, user_created_date as createdDate from yogiyo_user where user_id = #{value} and user_status = 'Y'
